sn12.17:4.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn12.17:4.3: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
sn12.17:4.4: Addasā kho acelo kassapo bhagavantaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ.
sn12.17:4.7: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
sn12.17:4.8: Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho acelo kassapo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn12.17:4.9: “puccheyyāma mayaṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ kañcideva desaṃ, sace no bhavaṃ gotamo okāsaṃ karoti pañhassa veyyākaraṇāyā”ti.
sn12.17:5.1: Dutiyampi kho acelo kassapo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn12.17:5.2: “puccheyyāma mayaṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ kañcideva desaṃ, sace no bhavaṃ gotamo okāsaṃ karoti pañhassa veyyākaraṇāyā”ti.
sn12.17:5.7: Evaṃ vutte, acelo kassapo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn12.17:5.8: “na kho pana mayaṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ bahudeva pucchitukāmā”ti.
sn12.17:6.5: ‘Kiṃ nu kho, bho gotama, sayaṅkatañca paraṅkatañca dukkhan’ti?
sn12.17:6.7: ‘Kiṃ pana, bho gotama, asayaṅkāraṃ aparaṅkāraṃ adhiccasamuppannaṃ dukkhan’ti?
sn12.17:6.9: ‘Kiṃ nu kho, bho gotama, natthi dukkhan’ti?
sn12.17:6.12: ‘Tena hi bhavaṃ gotamo dukkhaṃ na jānāti, na passatī’ti.
sn12.17:6.13: ‘Na khvāhaṃ, kassapa, dukkhaṃ na jānāmi, na passāmi.
sn12.17:7.1: “Kiṃ nu kho, bho gotama, ‘sayaṃkataṃ dukkhan’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘mā hevaṃ, kassapā’ti vadesi.
sn12.17:7.2: ‘Kiṃ pana, bho gotama, paraṃkataṃ dukkhan’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘mā hevaṃ, kassapā’ti vadesi.
sn12.17:7.3: ‘Kiṃ nu kho, bho gotama, sayaṃkatañca paraṃkatañca dukkhan’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘mā hevaṃ, kassapā’ti vadesi.
sn12.17:7.4: ‘Kiṃ pana, bho gotama, asayaṃkāraṃ aparaṅkāraṃ adhiccasamuppannaṃ dukkhan’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘mā hevaṃ, kassapā’ti vadesi.
sn12.17:7.5: ‘Kiṃ nu kho, bho gotama, natthi dukkhan’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘na kho, kassapa, natthi dukkhaṃ, atthi kho, kassapa, dukkhan’ti vadesi.
sn12.17:7.6: ‘Tena hi bhavaṃ gotamo dukkhaṃ na jānāti na passatī’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘na khvāhaṃ, kassapa, dukkhaṃ na jānāmi na passāmi.
sn12.17:7.9: Ācikkhatu ca me, bhante, bhagavā dukkhaṃ.
sn12.17:7.10: Desetu ca me, bhante, bhagavā dukkhan”ti.
sn12.17:8.1: “‘So karoti so paṭisaṃvedayatī’ti kho, kassapa, ādito sato ‘sayaṃkataṃ dukkhan’ti iti vadaṃ sassataṃ etaṃ pareti.
sn12.17:8.2: ‘Añño karoti añño paṭisaṃvedayatī’ti kho, kassapa, vedanābhitunnassa sato ‘paraṃkataṃ dukkhan’ti iti vadaṃ ucchedaṃ etaṃ pareti.
sn12.17:8.3: Ete te, kassapa, ubho ante anupagamma majjhena tathāgato dhammaṃ deseti:
sn12.17:9.1: Evaṃ vutte, acelo kassapo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn12.17:9.3: Seyyathāpi, bhante, nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya … pe …
sn12.17:9.6: Esāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
sn12.17:9.7: Labheyyāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, labheyyaṃ upasampadan”ti.
sn12.17:10.1: “Yo kho, kassapa, aññatitthiyapubbo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye ākaṅkhati pabbajjaṃ, ākaṅkhati upasampadaṃ, so cattāro māse parivasati.
sn12.17:10.2: Catunnaṃ māsānaṃ accayena āraddhacittā bhikkhū pabbājenti upasampādenti bhikkhubhāvāya.
sn12.17:11.1: “Sace, bhante, aññatitthiyapubbo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye ākaṅkhati pabbajjaṃ, ākaṅkhati upasampadaṃ, cattāro māse parivasati.
sn12.17:11.2: Catunnaṃ māsānaṃ accayena āraddhacittā bhikkhū pabbājenti upasampādenti bhikkhubhāvāya.
sn12.17:11.3: Ahaṃ cattāri vassāni parivasissāmi, catunnaṃ vassānaṃ accayena āraddhacittā bhikkhū pabbājentu upasampādentu bhikkhubhāvāyā”ti.
sn12.17:12.1: Alattha kho acelo kassapo bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, alattha upasampadaṃ.
sn12.17:12.2: Acirūpasampanno ca panāyasmā kassapo eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—
sn12.17:12.3: yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti tadanuttaraṃ—
sn12.17:12.4: brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
sn12.17:12.5: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
sn12.17:12.6: Aññataro ca panāyasmā kassapo arahataṃ ahosīti.
